SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.repository

Interface TenantJpaRepositoryCustom

All Superinterfaces:
BaseRepositoryCustom<Tenant>, TenantBaseCustom
All Known Subinterfaces:
TenantJpaRepository
All Known Implementing Classes:
TenantJpaRepositoryImpl
public interface TenantJpaRepositoryCustom extends BaseRepositoryCustom<Tenant>, TenantBaseCustom
Custom repository interface for tenant-specific operations in GrafioschTrader. Extends base repository functionality with tenant management operations.

      the tenant entity after watchlist removal

    • attachWatchlist

      Tenant attachWatchlist(Integer idTenant)
      Attaches watchlist data to the tenant entity for lazy loading.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID to attach watchlists to
      Returns:
      the tenant entity with attached watchlist data

    • isExcludeDividendTaxcost

      boolean isExcludeDividendTaxcost()
      Checks if dividend tax costs should be excluded for the current tenant.
      Returns:
      true if dividend tax costs should be excluded, false otherwise

    • createNotExistingCurrencypairs

      Optional<Tenant> createNotExistingCurrencypairs(Integer idTenant)
      Creates missing currency pairs for the specified tenant based on portfolio currencies.
      Parameters:
      idTenant - the tenant ID to create currency pairs for
      Returns:
      Optional containing the tenant if found, empty otherwise

    • changeCurrencyTenantAndPortfolios

      Tenant changeCurrencyTenantAndPortfolios(String currency)
      Changes the currency for both tenant and all associated portfolios.
      Parameters:
      currency - the new currency code to set
      Returns:
      the updated tenant entity
